sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing an ace of spades from a standard deck of 52 cards?
message_2: There is only 1 ace of spades in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing an ace of spades is 1/52 or approximately 0.0192 or 1.92%.
